46.eng-name: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Bahz bin Hakim, from his father, from his grandfather, that:the Messenger of Allah detained a man who was under suspicion, and then he let him go. (Hssan)

chapter.eng-name: Making A Suspected thief Admit to His Crime By Beating and Detaining Him.
